goal.en: “Today, a wide array of powerful and elegant tools is utilized for obtaining qualitative and quantitative information about the composition and structure of matter. Therefore, students (or researchers) of chemistry, biochemistry, physics, geology, geophysics, the life sciences, and environmental science are required to develop an understanding of these fundamental instrumental tools and their applications (and limitations) to solve critical problems in these fields. This lecture on instrumental analytics conveys (1) a carefully chosen combination of theoretical description of the analytical methods for realizing the fundamental principles of modern analytical instrumentation, and (2) a practical operation (and measurement) and the detailed instruction of the instrumental analyses for being familiar with the analytical methods. In addition, when students are familiar with the fundamental analytical methods, they then will make appropriate choices and efficient use of these measurement tools. The objective of this lecture is therefore to give students both a thorough introduction and a practical operation of the instrumental analyses for developing the knowledge and skill of analytical methods, and by extension, solving potential issues in their own fields with instrumental techniques.“
goal.ch: “現今，有許多功能強大且精緻的工具被使用來獲得物質組成與結構的定量與定性的資訊。因此，化學、生化、物理、地質、地物、生命科學，與環境科學領域的學生(或研究學者)都需要培養基本儀器工具與其應用的瞭解，來解決其領域所遇到之問題。 本儀器分析課程包含(1) 精心挑選的分析方法之理論描述的組合，讓學生瞭解現代分析儀器的基本原理，和(2)儀器分析的實際操作(和測量)和詳細的操作介紹，讓學生熟悉分析方法。另外，當學生熟悉這些實用的儀器分析方法，他們就可以在這些測量儀器中做出適當的選擇與有效的使用。因此本課程之目標是給學生關於儀器分析一個全面的介紹和實際操作，進而培養儀器分析的知識和技能，或引伸到，利用現有之儀器的知識與技巧解決其領域所遇到之問題。“

content.en:
“bilingual teaching
1. An introduction to instrumental analysis (why we should learn)
2. Principle of X-ray diffraction (XRD)
3. Analysis of X-ray diffraction (in the case of clay minerals)
4. Sample preparation for X-ray diffraction analysis
5. Analysis of X-ray diffraction in action
6. An introduction to Infrared spectrometry (IR)
7. Theory to Raman spectrometry
8. An introduction to Transmission electron microscope (TEM)
9. Mid-term (characterize the material with XRD)
10. An introduction to Spectrometric methods
11. Principle of X-ray fluorescence (XRF)
12. Analysis of X-ray fluorescence in action
13. Principle of Elemental analysis (EA)
14. Analysis of Elemental analysis in action
15. Principle of Scanning electron microscope (SEM)
16. Observation of Scanning electron microscope in action
17. Final-term (measure the chemical composition of material “X” with XRF)
18. Final-term (observe the provided material with SEM)“
content.ch:
“雙語授課
1.儀器分析簡介 (為什麼要學儀器分析)
2. X光繞射原理 (XRD)
3. X光繞射分析(以黏土礦物為例)
4. X光繞射樣品製備
5. X光繞射樣品分析
6. 紅外光譜儀原理及應用
7. 拉曼光譜儀原理及應用
8. 穿透式電子顯微鏡原理
9. 期中考 (用X光繞射檢測未知物質之結構)
10. 光譜儀簡介
11. X光螢光分析原理 (XRF)
12. X光螢光分析操作
13. 原子質量光譜儀 (EA)
14. 原子質量光譜儀分析操作
15. 場發射掃描式電子顯微鏡原理 (SEM)
16. 場發射掃描式電子顯微鏡操作
17. 期末考(用X光繞射測量未知物質之化學組成)
18. 期末考(場發射掃描式電子顯微鏡上機實測)“

textbook.en: “Holler, Skoog, and Crouch (2007), Principles of instrumental analysis 6th edition, Brooks/Cole Cengage learning, 1038 pp. D.M. Moore and R.C.jr Reynolds (1997), X-Ray diffraction and the Identification and Analysis of Clay minerals, Oxford, New York, 378 pp.“
textbook.ch: “實用電子顯微鏡技術，付洪蘭(2007)，256頁。 近代穿透式電子顯微鏡實務，鮑忠興與劉思謙(2008)，347頁。 拉曼光譜的分析與應用，楊序綱與吳琪琳(2008) ，305頁“
